DOC.brief_summary: Endometrial cancer one common gynecological cancer , incidence increase world . However , n't large sample data endometrial cancer report China . Thus Endometrial cancer project Guangdong province conduct large multicentre clinical investigation endometrial cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Epidemiological Analysis Endometrial Cancer Guangdong Province China
DOC.detailed_description: Endometrial cancer project Guangdong province mainly conduct Department Gynecology Third Affiliated Hospital Sun Yet-sen University , 62 major hospital Guangdong province participate project . In large multicentre clinical investigation , endometrial cancer database include 10,000 case establish . Further investigator demonstrate epidemiological characteristic , etiology , risk factor , clinical treatment prognosis endometrial cancer .
DOC.criteria: patient diagnose endometrial carcinoma 2000 2010 Guangdong province China ; patient intact clinical pathological information include inclusion criterion
